summary:
Darken the corner and hide with two new, lore-friendly and high-quality custom effects spells. Moonshadow, and Concealment.

Staff and scrolls are available as well. Now's time for your stealthy, magic caster to rejoice!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][b][color=#674ea7][size=2]______________________________________________________________________________________________[/size][/color]
[/b][/b]
[size=3][img]https://i.imgur.com/NvH4Dfx.png[/img][/size]

[youtube]u5HzrTQ7XrA[/youtube]

[u][u][color=#674ea7][size=2]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/size][/color][/u][/u]


[size=3]    Check out my SE quest mod:[/size][size=4][b][font=Verdana][color=#cc4125]『[/color][/font][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9554][font=Courier New][color=#6d9eeb]The Final Cataclysm[/color][/font][/url][font=Verdana][color=#cc4125][b]』[/b][/color][/font][/size][u]
[/u][i][color=#cfe2f3][size=2]*Please check out the new update if you're playing that mod. Loads of new contents were added.[/size][/color][/i]


[size=3]2 new expert illusion spells added to the leveled list (Via. Quest, no conflict) Moonshadow and Concealment. [/size]
[size=3]Staff and scrolls would be added alongside the spells as well. They will not appear instantly, but over time[/size]
[size=3]as you play the game. You can, however, add them with console commands.[/size]

[size=3]These light-reduction spells affect sneaking and detection of NPCs.[/size]
[size=3]They can be used for sneaking in board [/size]daylight,[size=3] or darken the interior to hide in the corner.[/size]

[size=3]In a sense, Moonshadow is the equivalent of Candlelight, Concealment is Magelight. [/size]


[i][size=4][color=#000000]►[/color][color=#C970ff]Moonshadow    [/color][/size][/i]
[color=#d8d8d8][size=2]  Expert Spell. Can be cast using either hand.[/size][/color]
[font=Verdana]Black orb hovers on the caster, shrouding him/her and the surrounding in darkness.[/font]


[i][i][color=#000000][size=4]►[/size][/color][/i][color=#C970ff][size=4]Concealment   [/size][size=3] [/size][/color][/i]
[color=#d8d8d8][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=2]  Expert Spell. Can be cast using either hand.[/size][/color]
[font=Verdana][size=3]Fire a black orb, shrouding anything near it in darkness. The orb sticks where it strikes.[/size]


#This version is a backport from SE, please tell me in the comment if something went wrong.
[color=#d5a6bd][size=2]Thank you and happy sneaking![/size][/color][/font]
[u][color=#674ea7]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/u][size=4][font=Verdana][b]
[/b][/font][/size]
[u][color=#000000]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[u]___________________________________[/u][/color][/u][/center][u][color=#000000][u]
[/u][/color][/u]
author: LertKrush
